item.title: Iridescent
item.description: I’m planning out a video game called “Iridescent”. The idea is to take some notes about what it could be. Each note would represent one feature or aspect of the game.

item.title: Iridescent and Open Source
item.description: I would like [[iridescent]] to be open source. Or at least “source available”. I would like anyone to be able to run it for free.

item.title: Reading this
item.description: You will never be the same after reading this.
